comments.author: alfredkayser@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
1. Play a video directly, e.g.: http://robwinters.s3.amazonaws.com/hosting/day_sleeper.ogg

2. Press escape

3. The browser content page becomes darker, and a 'close' cross is shown in the middle, but it is not clickable.

Probably related to bug 684625.
